# init()

**Initializer**

Returns a new iterative method structure.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Initializers

- **init(method:options:)**: Returns a new iterative method structure with the specified method and options.

items.description: Returns a new iterative method structure with the specified method and options.
